name: Pegman
overview: This is like something between Lode Runner and the Atari 2600 version of The Sorceror's Apprentice. The objective is to switch off all the taps before the place is flooded. This was dveloped by Alain Tremblay and published as a type-in by COMPUTE! Publications, Inc. in the 1992/04 issue of COMPUTE!'s Gazette (which was at the time an insert in the regular COMPUTE! magazine, and not a standalone magazine)
